sentences.sContent: He glanced furtively at the stolid faces of the two detectives.
sentences.sCn: 他偷偷地瞄了一下两名侦探面无表情的脸。

synos.tran: 迟钝的；缺乏热情的；冷漠的

remMethod.val: 脑袋都硬 (solid) 了， 感觉迟钝 (stolid)

trans.tranCn: 不易激动的， 感觉迟钝的， 神经麻木的
trans.tranOther: someone who is stolid does not react to situations or seem excited by them when most people would react – used to show disapproval
